# Covariance Ellipses

A $2\times2$ covariance matrix $\Sigma$ can be plotted as an ellipse, which is a contour line of a Gaussian density function with variance $\Sigma$. See @fig-covariance for an example.

```{julia}
#| label: fig-covariance
#| fig-cap: "Covariance ellipses"

using StatsPlots
gr(size = (500, 280))

covellipse([0, 2], [2 1; 1 4], n_std = 2, aspect_ratio = 1, label = "cov1")
covellipse!([1, 0], [1 -0.5; -0.5 3], showaxes = true, label = "cov2")
```
